pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compute SHAP Values for Your Tree-Based Models Using the 'TreeSHAP' Algorithm // An efficient implementation of the 'TreeSHAP' algorithm introduced by Lundberg et al., (2020) doi:10.1038/s42256-019-0138-9. It is capable of calculating SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations) values for tree-based models in polynomial time. Currently supported models include 'gbm', 'randomForest', 'ranger', 'xgboost', 'lightgbm'.
